children.value: 30. Write a C program to check whether two matrices are equal or not.

Input Rows and Columns of the 1st matrix :
2 2
Input Rows and Columns of the 2nd matrix :
2 2
Input elements in the first matrix :
element - [0],[0] : 1
element - [0],[1] : 2
element - [1],[0] : 3
element - [1],[1] : 4
Input elements in the second matrix :
element - [0],[0] : 5
element - [0],[1] : 6
element - [1],[0] : 7
element - [1],[1] : 8
The first matrix is :
 1  2
 3  4
The second matrix is :
 5  6
 7  8
The Matrices can be compared.
But,two matrices are not equal.
